short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates expungement documents from MD Case Search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows for the auto-generation of expungement documents from the Maryland Judiciary Case Search. The user can process multiple cases at once and view each charge within a case. It additionally provides an estimate of expungibility via a color code. For example, green indicates a likely expungible case/charge, yellow a potentially inexpungible case/charge, and red a likely inexpungible case/charge. 

The use of this extension/software does not create an attorney-client relationship. Any information, including predictions, does not constitute legal advice. Please always consult an attorney before making any legal decision and review all forms printed.
